  • Method Details

    • addDBJ

      public void addDBJ()
      Add DBJ increments the dbj parameter, which saves the amount of blackjacks the dealer has received

    • Add_cardtohand

      public void Add_cardtohand​(cards.Deck GameDeck)
      Add Card to Dealer Hand Adds a new drawn card to Dealer Hand
      Parameters:
      GameDeck - current gamedeck that is being used

    • clear_hand

      public void clear_hand()
      Clear Hand clears dealer's hand and fills Discard Pile with cards that were discarded

    • dealerHandScore

      public int dealerHandScore​(int gameState)
      Dealer hand Score
      Parameters:
      gameState - current state of the Game
      Returns:
      total score of the dealer's hand

    • showDealer

      public int showDealer​(LinkedList<cards.Card> hand, int gameState)
      Show Dealer
      Parameters:
      hand - LinkedList of cards present in Dealer's hand
      gameState - current state of the Game
      Returns:
      total score of Dealer's Hand This method performs differently depending on the game state If it's called after a Deal, Dealer will have 2 cards, but only show 1 and that one's score, and hide the 2nd card and it's score with an X, designated hole card. If called in any other moment, then it shows the Dealers complete hand, without the hole card This method is also the method that deals with Soft and Hard hands of the Dealer

    • rankConversionTable

      public int rankConversionTable​(char rank)
      Rank Conversion Table
      Parameters:
      rank - rank of the Card object
      Returns:
      Creates the conversion table for the Hi-lo strat

    • assignValueToRankD

      public int assignValueToRankD​(LinkedList<cards.Card> hand)
      Assigns Value to Rank
      Parameters:
      hand - LinkedList of Card objects
      Returns:
      Running Count for Hi-lo

    • countFivesAndAcesDealer

      public int countFivesAndAcesDealer​(LinkedList<cards.Card> hand)
      Count Five and Aces Dealer
      Parameters:

      Returns:
